name: Fit to Rule
description:
HOW THE THEME "FIT":
the theme is "Survival of the Fittest", one of the vital ingredient of being a survivor is to think fast, in this game you'll be playing as a king, and being a king you have to know where to put your soldiers in a time limit to win the war.

HOW TO PLAY?
It's like rock paper scissor
Knights kills Spearman
Spearman kills Cavaliers
Cavaliers kills Knights
(obviously...)
You can SKIP the battle stage by clicking the HOUR GLASS

Controls:
Click the troops to change their form,
It CYCLES ( Knights -> Spearman ->  Cavaliers )
you can outplay the enemy by placing CARDS:

CARDS:
Left Click to Select a Card
Right Click to UNSELECT a Card
Circle in the top right indicates how to use them
If it is PURPLE it means it's automatic, you just have to click it
if it is PINK it means you need to place it in the map
the Frame surrounds the card means of what they are:
RED - OFFENSIVE
BLUE - DEFENSIVE
ORANGE - CROWD CONTROL
